TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SessionStateItemExpireCallback(string id, SessionStateStoreData item);
.class public auto ansi sealed SessionStateItemExpireCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SessionStateItemExpireCallback(id As String, item As SessionStateStoreData)
public delegate void SessionStateItemExpireCallback(System::String ^ id, SessionStateStoreData ^ item);
type SessionStateItemExpireCallback = delegate of string * SessionStateStoreData -> unit

Docs.param: The parameter of the session that is ending.
A object containing the session-state data for the session that is ending.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the event of a session-state module.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemExpireCallback> delegate is used to enable a <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase> implementation to call the `Session_OnEnd` event from the Global.asax file.
For more information, see the remarks provided for the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.SetItemExpireCallback%2A> method.
